title: The Spine Group - Aromatherapy Chiropractor Wilmington, Delaware
cleaned_text: 1426 North Clayton Street Wilmington, DE, 19806 Phone: 302-595-3030 Fax: 302-595-3032 Aromatherapy is the practice of using the natural oils extracted from flowers, bark, stems, leaves, roots or other parts of a plant to enhance psychological and physical well-being. The inhaled aroma from these "essential" oils is widely believed to stimulate brain function. Essential oils can also be absorbed through the skin, where they travel through the bloodstream and can promote whole-body healing. Each and every patient that gets treated in our office can personally customize their essential oil blend for their treatment that day at no additional cost.
